mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* from T_TJJH_CKT_01 a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) WHERE rn > #{start}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rn, a.* from T_TJJH_CKT_01 a WHERE (a.UNITNO like CONCAT('#', CONCAT(#{info},'#'))) AND ROWNUM <= #{end}) WHERE rn > #{start}

select * from ( select ROWNUM as rn, a.* from (select a.* from ( SELECT "SUBSTR"(DATATIME,1,4) as year, CK0110021, sum(CK0120011) as CK0120011 FROM CDPRJ.T_TJJH_CKT_01 where "SUBSTR"(DATATIME,1,4) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY CK0110021,"SUBSTR"(DATATIME,1,4)) a where CK0120011 IS NOT NULL AND CK0110021 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY year DESC, CK0120011 DESC) a) where rn > 0 AND rn <= 10
SELECT "SUBSTR"(DATATIME,1,4) as year, sum(CK0120011) as CK0120011 FROM CDPRJ.T_TJJH_CKT_01 where "SUBSTR"(DATATIME,1,4) BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
